body:
### Describe the bug

The code (see below) leads to the following compilation warning with `python setup.py build_ext --inplace`.

```
Compiling mwe.py because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing mwe.py
running build_ext
building 'mwe' extension
creating build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313
gcc -fno-strict-overflow -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/nix/store/nf0av6mk9w9sx1pn88ymhws2y5ciq6kk-python3-3.13.7-env/include -I/nix/store/829wb290i87wngxlh404klwxql5v18p4-python3-3.13.7/include/python3.13 -c mwe.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.o -fopenmp
mwe.c: In function ‘__pyx_pf_3mwe_func._omp_fn.0’:
mwe.c:16700:138: warning: ‘__pyx_clineno’ may be used uninitialized [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
16700 |                                   __pyx_parallel_filename = __pyx_filename; __pyx_parallel_lineno = __pyx_lineno; __pyx_parallel_clineno = __pyx_clineno;
      |                                                                                                                   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
mwe.c:16628:7: note: ‘__pyx_clineno’ was declared here
16628 |   int __pyx_clineno = 0;
      |       ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
creating build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313
gcc -shared -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bzip2-1.0.8/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-libffi-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-util-linux-minimal-2.41.1-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-ncurses-6.5/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-xz-5.8.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-zlib-1.3.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-openssl-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-sqlite-3.50.2/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-mpdecimal-4.0.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-expat-2.7.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bluez-headers-5.83/lib -L/nix/store/795l5yj7fa6wqdkknhgja1n46y441qyp-tzdata-2025b/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-gdbm-1.25-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-readline-8.3p1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bzip2-1.0.8/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-libffi-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-util-linux-minimal-2.41.1-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-ncurses-6.5/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-xz-5.8.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-zlib-1.3.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-openssl-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-sqlite-3.50.2/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-mpdecimal-4.0.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-expat-2.7.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bluez-headers-5.83/lib -L/nix/store/795l5yj7fa6wqdkknhgja1n46y441qyp-tzdata-2025b/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-gdbm-1.25-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-readline-8.3p1/lib build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.o -L/nix/store/829wb290i87wngxlh404klwxql5v18p4-python3-3.13.7/lib -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.cpython-313-x86_64-linux-gnu.so -fopenmp
copying build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.cpython-313-x86_64-linux-gnu.so ->
```

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

`mwe.py`

```python
import cython

from cython.parallel import prange


@cython.cfunc
@cython.exceptval(check=False)
@cython.nogil
def f(x: cython.double[:]) -> cython.void:
    return


def func(x: cython.double[:]):
    i: cython.size_t

    for i in prange(x.shape[0], nogil=True):
        f(x[:])
```

`setup.py`

```python
from Cython.Build import cythonize
from setuptools import Extension, setup

setup(
    ext_modules=cythonize(
        Extension(
            "*",
            ["mwe.py"],
            extra_compile_args=["-fopenmp"],
            extra_link_args=["-fopenmp"],
        )
    ),
)
```

### Expected behaviour

No warning. Interestingly, the warning goes away if `parallel` is used.

```python
import cython

from cython.parallel import parallel, prange


@cython.cfunc
@cython.exceptval(check=False)
@cython.nogil
def f(x: cython.double[:]) -> cython.void:
    return


def func(x: cython.double[:]):
    i: cython.size_t

    with cython.nogil, parallel():
        for i in prange(x.shape[0]):
            f(x[:])
```

```
Compiling mwe.py because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing mwe.py
running build_ext
building 'mwe' extension
gcc -fno-strict-overflow -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -O3 -Wall -fPIC -I/nix/store/nf0av6mk9w9sx1pn88ymhws2y5ciq6kk-python3-3.13.7-env/include -I/nix/store/829wb290i87wngxlh404klwxql5v18p4-python3-3.13.7/include/python3.13 -c mwe.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.o -fopenmp
gcc -shared -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bzip2-1.0.8/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-libffi-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-util-linux-minimal-2.41.1-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-ncurses-6.5/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-xz-5.8.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-zlib-1.3.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-openssl-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-sqlite-3.50.2/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-mpdecimal-4.0.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-expat-2.7.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bluez-headers-5.83/lib -L/nix/store/795l5yj7fa6wqdkknhgja1n46y441qyp-tzdata-2025b/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-gdbm-1.25-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-readline-8.3p1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bzip2-1.0.8/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-libffi-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-util-linux-minimal-2.41.1-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-ncurses-6.5/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-xz-5.8.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-zlib-1.3.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-openssl-3.5.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-sqlite-3.50.2/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-mpdecimal-4.0.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-expat-2.7.1/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-bluez-headers-5.83/lib -L/nix/store/795l5yj7fa6wqdkknhgja1n46y441qyp-tzdata-2025b/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-gdbm-1.25-lib/lib -L/nix/store/eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee-readline-8.3p1/lib build/temp.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.o -L/nix/store/829wb290i87wngxlh404klwxql5v18p4-python3-3.13.7/lib -o build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.cpython-313-x86_64-linux-gnu.so -fopenmp
copying build/lib.linux-x86_64-cpython-313/mwe.cpython-313-x86_64-linux-gnu.so ->
```

### OS

Linux

### Python version

3.13.7

### Cython version

3.2.0

### Additional context

_No response_
title: [BUG] Spurious uninitialized warning when slicing inside a prange
